## CallInvite.accept() method

Accept a call invite. Sets the state of this call invite to [CallInvite.State.Accepted](./twilio-voice-react-native.callinvite_namespace.state_enum.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
accept(options?: CallInvite.AcceptOptions): Promise<Call>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [CallInvite.AcceptOptions](./twilio-voice-react-native.callinvite_namespace.acceptoptions_interface.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Options to pass to the native layer when accepting the call. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Call](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_class.md)<!-- -->&gt;

- Resolves when a [Call object](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_class.md) associated with this [CallInvite](./twilio-voice-react-native.callinvite_class.md) has been created.
